mdRecord.dcterms:title: Wentworth, Bert to Henry Faulds regarding fingerprints, etc.; 01 of 02
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--LettersItems 41-117--Scrapbook 2Wentworth, Bert to Henry Faulds regarding the West brothers fingerprint case, Wentworth's health, and IAI business.
